Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We saw no association between metolachlor use and incidence of all cancers combined ( n = 5 , 701 with a 5 - year lag ) or most site - specific cancers .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| all cancers combined |
| site-specific cancers |

In this paragraph, the entities are "all cancers combined" and "site-specific cancers". The term "incidence" refers to the number of new cases of a disease in a given population during a specified time period, so it is not considered a separate disease entity. The term "metolachlor use" is a risk factor or exposure, not a disease.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| all cancers combined |
| site-specific cancers |

In this paragraph, the entities are "all cancers combined" and "site-specific cancers", which are clearly diseases. The term "incidence" refers to the number of new cases of a disease in a given population during a specified time period, but it is not a disease itself. The term "metolachlor use" is a risk factor or exposure, not a disease.
